title: Charred Corn Relish
ingredients: - 4 ears fresh corn, roasted, kernels removed from the cobs
- ½ small red onion, thinly sliced
- Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Combine the corn, onion, vinegar, honey, oil, basil, and salt and pepper to taste in a bowl. Let sit at room temperature for at least 15 minutes and up to 1 hour before serving.
